summary.what: Add draft --models flag and multi-CLI piping docs (codex, gemini)
summary.why: Users on non-Claude CLIs had no docs; --models gives agents self-service provider/key discovery
summary.how: ProviderInfos() export in llm.go, draft_models.go handler, README/tutorial/llm-commands updated with verified piping syntax

notes: Research agent and review agent disagreed on codex/gemini CLI syntax. Tested both locally: gemini auto-detects piped stdin (no -p needed), codex -m flag belongs on exec subcommand not root. Review also caught mutable map exposure in ProviderInfos â€” fixed with maps.Copy.
